title_zh: W36 變化 · 專案更新

turns.en: Hi. Can we do a quick project update?
turns.zh: 嗨，我們快速更新一下專案嗎？

turns.en: What did you finish this week?
We finalized the W1–W9 content pack.
turns.zh: 我們完成了 W1–W9 的內容包。

turns.en: Next, we’ll refine W10–W19 and test user flow.
turns.zh: 接下來會優化 W10–W19 並測試流程。
有些對話需要更真實的來回___。
turns.hint_en: Some dialogs need more realistic turns.
turns.hint_zh: 有些對話需要更真實的來回。
turns.answer: Some dialogs need more realistic turns.

turns.en: We’ll add confirmations and follow‑up questions.
A review of the cloze rules would ___
turns.zh: 希望你幫我檢查挖空規則___。
turns.hint_en: A review of the cloze rules would help.
turns.hint_zh: 希望你幫我檢查挖空規則。
turns.answer: A review of the cloze rules would help.
